c68b040a-9fce-41d0-b744-18be97a58ca7.description: This badge earner understands how the requirements of the ISO 17025 apply to the laboratory and risk factors that need to be considered. The earner understands how the standard is assessed for the purposes of achieving accreditation in their context, and is able to apply the requirements of ISO/IEC 17025 to laboratory systems.
c68b040a-9fce-41d0-b744-18be97a58ca7.name: Understanding ISO/IEC 17025 2022

a75f2d06-a5eb-4adb-87c1-3fc583a205b4.description: This badge earner is able to develop and plan for an internal audit. They understand audit, information and evidence gathering techniques, can applying sufficiency of evidence, and are able to identify and report non-conformities. 0687b1ec-cd11-466f-8973-d5e815c54f1a.description: Badge earners are eligible to conduct assessments on behalf of NATA. The badge earner has an in-depth knowledge of the requirements of the Standard and the ability to undertake assessments. They add value through their knowledge and ability to carry out an assessment. They understand the importance of stakeholder engagement and ensure the assessment is a positive experience. They are equipped with the strategies and tools needed to conduct an successful assessment.
0687b1ec-cd11-466f-8973-d5e815c54f1a.name: Technical Assessor Development Program 2022

issuer.summary: issued by National Association of Testing Authorities

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a one-day course with scenarios and role plays

4ad2d4da-aa62-4058-8192-a695d56dc307.description: This badge earner understands that a good quality system drives consistent and reliable results. They know that building and maintaining an effective, sustainable quality system involves a number of key components that must be carefully considered and developed. They are aware of all aspects of a quality system to enable them to meet the technical competency requirements set by the Standard. They can identify risks within the system and develop control systems to maintain quality.
4ad2d4da-aa62-4058-8192-a695d56dc307.name: Quality Management in the Laboratory 2022
